Text: FW Cc Gary Bryan Tom and Jim Lets discuss at and then Ill forward any changes to Jeff Hodge in preparation of the Alliance Draft Jeff Im sending this just for fyi until after me and the guys meet Ill get with you following our meeting Original Message From Redmond Brian Sent Wednesday October AM To Roberts Linda Subject please see my changes to Schedule A I did not get to the others yet Brian

Updated Texas General Land Office Management Proposal conference room changePST On behalf of Linda Roberts A meeting has been scheduled to discuss Texas General Land Office Management Proposal This meeting will take place as follows Thursday October AM AM Enron Corp Smith Houston TX EB M th floor If you have any questions please contact Linda Roberts Thank you Irena Hogan Sr Administrative Assistant

Texas Gen Land Office request for gas deliveries Crude Oil Purchase Contract Q Cc David This is to confirm that you have requested that the oil proceeds we received be used to make gas deliveries in the following months as follows April May June July While the above numbers are in dollars we are currently calculating the price for each of these months that will result in the volume to be delivered at a fixed price If this information is correct please confirm immediately by email so that we can complete this transaction by am today as you requested

RE Texas General Land Office MtgJim I forwarded your email on to Richard Bone with the Land Office He will be prepared to enlighten us on Thursday Original Message From Schwieger Jim Sent Monday October AM To Roberts Linda Bryan Gary Cc Martin Thomas A Redmond Brian Subject Texas General Land Office Mtg Prior to the meeting with the Texas General Land Office I think it would be beneficial to have some one accumulate the following information What has the load profile for the Markets served by the Texas General Land Office look liked in the past how does the load profile look now and how is the load profile expected to change in the future If there is swing on an hour to hour basis during the day how will this be managed if HPL no longer provides the Storage service Before we make recommendations on how to solve their challenges I think we need to fully understand the services they provide to the various Texas institutions

REThanks Jason Ill handle Original Message From Williams Jason Trading Sent Tuesday November PM To Roberts Linda Subject FW Original Message From Cheryl Hartsell ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Subject Attached please find a list of estimated gas supplies for December In order to successfully email your changes back to me please UPDATE the worksheet SAVE and FORWARD the saved worksheet to my email address Looking forward to hearing from you Cheryl Hartsell Gas Marketing Representative UNIMARK LLC Phone ext Fax email GSAEmailxls File GSAEmailxls
